itunes:title: Parasailing With A Fear of Heights
title: Parasailing With A Fear of Heights
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
There's a serial dog pooper in the neighborhood, the boys go parasailing 800 feet, and a hungover pasta cooking class. Plus you can win a signed plunger from Ilya and Joe!


Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod to be entered to win the giveaway next week for almost $500!
